channel.title: Crashing
channel.description:
Wtf this just happend like 7 times in a row
[code=javascript]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.berserk(client.java:181) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:27582) at client.process(client.java:16445) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:55) [/code] i really need help

item.title: Crashing
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

Ok for anyone that ever has this problem its the obby maul… idk why but when you attack with it

at least on figmentscape base it crashes server…

Read full topic
